title: Growing From Food!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Hnnn~~♪ Buono♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Heh, obviously. There’s no way my cooking would taste bad.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>The food you make is really, really buono, Nico-chan. It reminds me of my mom’s....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Oh really? Your mom is also an excellent cook, huh, Emma?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah. That’s why I eat lots of her food. Thanks to that, I didn’t catch colds and grew up healthy~. I’m going to eat lots of your food too and be even healthier, Nico-chan♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, I don’t think you need to grow more than that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eh? What do you mean, Nico-chan? What are you looking at?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>It’s nothing! You should be grateful to your parents for giving you a good body that can distribute nutrition well, okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah! I’m very grateful! Seconds please, Nico-chaaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Don’t you dare grow even more from my food! Alright!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
